name: Quarterback
description: The leader of the offense who receives the snap and either passes, hands off, or runs with the ball.

name: Running Back
description: Carries the ball on running plays and sometimes catches passes.

name: Wide Receiver
description: Lines up on the outside and runs routes to catch passes.

name: Tight End
description: A hybrid position that combines elements of an offensive lineman and a receiver.

name: Offensive Tackle
description: Offensive linemen positioned on the ends of the line who protect the quarterback.

name: Offensive Guard
description: Offensive linemen positioned between the center and tackles.

name: Center
description: The offensive lineman who snaps the ball to the quarterback.

name: Defensive End
description: Defensive linemen positioned at the ends of the line who rush the passer.

name: Defensive Tackle
description: Interior defensive linemen who stop running plays and pressure the quarterback.

name: Linebacker
description: Second-level defenders who stop running plays, rush the passer, and cover receivers.

name: Cornerback
description: Defensive backs who primarily cover wide receivers.

name: Safety
description: Defensive backs who line up deep in the secondary.

name: Kicker
description: Specialist who handles kickoffs and field goal attempts.

name: Punter
description: Specialist who punts the ball on fourth down.
